name: CSVWritingOptions
desc: A set of CSV file-writing options.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates the default set of options for writing a CSV file.

items.name: init(includesHeader: Bool, nilEncoding: String, trueEncoding: String, falseEncoding: String, newline: String, delimiter: Character)
items.desc: Creates a set of options for writing a CSV file.

items.name: var dateFormatter: (Date) -> String
items.desc: A closure that maps dates to their string representations.

items.name: var delimiter: Character
items.desc: The character the CSV file generator uses to separate data fields in a CSV file.

items.name: var falseEncoding: String
items.desc: The string the CSV file generator uses to represent false Boolean values.

items.name: var includesHeader: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to write a header with the column names.

items.name: var newline: String
items.desc: The string the CSV file generator uses to represent a newline sequence.

items.name: var nilEncoding: String
items.desc: The string the CSV file generator uses to represent nil values.

items.name: var trueEncoding: String
items.desc: The string the CSV file generator uses to represent true Boolean values.
